description: Twenty artists from Redlees Studios in Isleworth are delighted to be  exhibiting at Brentford Project Event Space. You will find jewellery, paintings, ceramics, textiles and mixed media artwork. Enjoy discovering contemporary art.

events.name: Selling Exhibition by Artists from Redlees Studios
events.notes: Free entry.... also open Saturday and Sunday 10am-6pm

factsheet.heading: Artists from Redlees Studios
paragraphs: Redlees Art Studios is a community of professional artists and designer makers.  Here you will find jewellers, painters, ceramicists, photographers, textile and mixed media artists, many of whom exhibit nationally and internationally.

The Studios were created in 1995 by the Arts Team in Hounslow, by converting the old stables building in Redlees Park. Some years later, with support from The Arts Council and Lottery funding, the upper floor of the building was converted into usable studio spaces. The building can accommodate up to 34 artists working in individual and in shared spaces.
 
On the ground floor there is an accessible gallery used regularly for exhibitions, workshops and classes.  Twice a year the artists open their doors and invite the public to a weekend of Open Studios.  You can visit them in their working spaces and enjoy the opportunity of discovering contemporary art, and buy or commission directly from the artists.

location.address: Brentford Project Event Space, Catherine Wheel Road, Brentford, TW8 8BD

name: The Event Space
